Pathogen Population Biology and Disease Management
Leave a comment or ask a question

Genetics of plant-pathogen interactions in oilseed brassicas (rapeseed-mustard), pathogenic variability of populations of oilseed brassicas pathogens, characterisation of differential sources of host resistance capable of discriminating pathotypes of fungal pathogens, genetic analysis of the inheritance of resistance, host response in relation to the interaction between pathogens, breeding for disease resistance (white rust, downy mildew and dark leaf & pod spot) and farmers participatory plant breeding/variety selection in India (please see international cooperation section below).
in rural India. This is far
